module.name: managerTUG
module.description: This module supervises the all the modules involved in the Timed Up and Go (TUG).
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.

param.desc: Name of the module. All the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /module_name.
Configuration file name for the speak.
Threshold on the distance between foot and finish line [m].
Threshold on the speed of the shoulder center height [m/s].
Robot initial pose (x,y,theta) wrt world frame when starting the TUG.
Time ctpService takes to complete the pointing movement.
List of joint positions for reaching arm home position (deg). Provided to ctpService.
List of joint positions for pointing at the chair (deg). Provided to ctpService.
List of joint positions for pointing at the finish line (deg). Provided to ctpService.
Threshold on the y distance between elbow and elbow, to detect if the arm is raised (normalized).
If true, the module detects if the hand is raised for triggering speech.
Minimum time within the speech trigger can be received from the previous one [s].
Maximum time within the speech trigger can be received from the previous one [s].
If true, the module is configured to work simulation in gazebo.
If true, the skeleton is locked.
Sets the target the actor has to reach during the TUG (only is simulation is true).

input.description: Receives skeletons and lines from \ref objectsPropertiesCollector.
Receives the answer to the question from \ref googleSpeechProcessing.

output.description: Sends commands to \ref attentionManager to redirect the robot's gaze toward the engaged user.
Sends commands to \ref motionAnalyzer for starting/stopping the real-time motion analysis.
Sends commands to \ref iSpeak to wait until the sentence is spoken.
Streams out the verbal interaction. To be connected to \ref iSpeak.
Sends commands to \ref navController to let the robot navigate to fixed points.
Sends commands to \ref ctpService to let the robot's left arm point at lines.
Sends commands to \ref ctpService to let the robot's right arm point at lines.
Sends commands to \ref skeletonLocker to set the skeleton to lock.
Sends commands to \ref googleSpeech to start/stop speech recognition.
Sends commands to gazebo plugin \ref tuginterface when simulation is true.
